Refinery is a project of the [Park Lab](http://compbio.med.harvard.edu) at [Harvard Medical School](http://cbmi.med.harvard.edu) in collaboration with the [Hide Lab](http://www.hsph.harvard.edu/faculty/winston-hide) at [Harvard School of Public Health](http://hsph.harvard.edu).

#### Members at Harvard Medical School

* Nils Gehlenborg
* Richard Park
* Psalm Haseley
* Peter J Park, _Principal Investigator_

#### Members at Harvard School of Public Health

* Shannan Ho Sui
* Ilya Sytchev
* Winston Hide
